revisionDesc.change: General - Renamed. Must be checked carefully against the edition before finalization.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;14;12116' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/zpe;193;246'

Vote - AcceptText - The correction is indeed given, with author and reference, in the apparatus to SB 12116. For DDBDP, best treat is as an editorial correction conform instruction of 1st voter. Perhaps change ed:D. Hagedorn, ZPE 25 (1977) p. 158 into ed:SB 14 p.471 (or is this exclusively used for Corrigenda lists)? Would ed:SB 14 app be a possibility??

Vote - AcceptText - The correction is indeed given, with author and reference, in the apparatus to SB 12116. For DDBDP, best treat is as an editorial correction conform instruction of 1st voter. Perhaps change ed:D. Hagedorn, ZPE 25 (1977) p. 158 into ed:SB 14 p.471 (or is this exclusively used for Corrigenda lists)? Would ed:SB 14 app be a possibility??

Vote - AcceptText - Correction is right, and wasn't picked up in the BL, as it's at the end of the ed.pr. (next voter, can you check whether it was picked up in SB? I assume here it wasn't), but the ed.pr. reading needs to be in the apparatus, so probably: <:(Χριστόδοτ(ος)) (λαμπρό(τατος)) 17. (κόμ(ες)) (δι(ὰ)) (ἐμ(οῦ))|ed:D. Hagedorn, ZPE 25 (1977) p. 158|(Χριστόδ(ωρος) (ὑπ(ὲρ)) ⟨τοῦ⟩ (λαμπρο(τάτου)) 17. (κόμ(ιτος)) ((καὶ)) (ἐμ(βολάτορος?)):> Finalizer, please correct also number in l. 10 -> <#μ[ε]=45#>. Add numtag in l. 15 (and move all numtags closer to the actual numbers...)
Substitution of Hagedorn's editorial suggestion for MacCoull's ed.pr. at lines 16-17. See ZPE 25 (1977) p. 158 at end. The Hagedorn reading is correct and verifiable against ZPE 25 Plate IV.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
